reviews.text: I stayed for 3 nights with my mother for the easter holiday. The bar/restaurant area on the ground floor looks very nice. In our arrangement breakfast and dinner was included.
reviews.title: Restaurant ok, but rooms are terribly old fashioned

reviews.text: You could choose from 4 different meals within the arrangment menu. Food was OK but not very special. You could choose a better quality surprise menu if you were willing to pay 15 euros extra (per person). Hotel rooms are very small and lack any comfort. It's like you step back in time and find a cramped hotelrroom in the attack with a tiny bathroom with shower like you would find in some hotels in 60s or 70s. No decorations in the room (execpt for one ugly advertising poster). Very noisy, traffic and people outside the hotel till late in the night. Rooms are clean and staff is kind and helpful though.
reviews.title: A delightful stay at Hotel de Wijnberg, Bolsward, Holland.

likes.liked: — Its Dutch/European decor and warm atmosphere
likes.disliked: — Rooms (new) still need some more colour in them. Mostly neutral and white during our stay.

reviews.text: We had a night at this hotel, while exploring our family history. I had the impression from other family members that Bolsward, in Friesland (nearest regional town is Sneek) was quite tiny.I also expected this hotel to be tired, and third rate, according to comments from relatives. As I believed our choice was very limited, I took the chance and booked the de Wijnberg.
reviews.title: Small single room. Like a prison cel!
